summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 7%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 905 m), feels like temperature (up 1.8°C), outside temperature (up 1.6°C), and light levels (down 3259 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 588.0m higher than yesterday, 303.4m lower than the past week, 905.5m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 1853.7m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. A few light raindrops may fall, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and strong and powerful sunlight. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
